trans-unit.source: Defines the polling modes for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Define os modos de consulta para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método.

trans-unit.source: The SelectMode enumeration defines the polling modes that can be passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A enumeração de SelectMode define os modos de consulta que podem ser transferidos para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectRead value to determine if a listening <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o valor de SelectRead para determinar se uma escuta <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>tem recebidos pedidos de ligação.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectWrite value to determine if a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is writeable.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o valor de SelectWrite para determinar se um <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>é passível de escrita.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectError value to determine if there is an error condition present on the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o valor de SelectError para determinar se existe uma condição de erro presente no <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: For explanations of writeability, readability, and the presence of error conditions, see the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para uma explicação de writeability, o facilitar a leitura e a presença de condições de erro, consulte o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Poll%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
